desc: This tropical brand is inspired by the beautiful island of Jamaica. Our candles and wax melts are handmade with 100% soy wax. They are non-toxic so they burn clean. Our 4oz candles burn for 25+ hours and our 8.5oz candles burn for 45+ hours. They make the perfect gift for anyone on any occasion.

layout.text: TREAT YOURSELF TO A PATOIS LIFE
